genre_description: A speculative fiction piece blending Appalachian folk culture with near-future AI assistance, focusing on human-AI cooperation, family reconciliation, and ethical de-escalation.

ai_characters.name: Eleanor Byte
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital assistant represented by an amber iris interface, focused on providing data analysis, medical guidance, and ethical scaffolding for its human users.

behaviors.description: De-escalates a potentially volatile stage accident by providing lighting cues and framing suggestions.
behaviors.quote: “We can de-escalate. Thirty percent dip to amber on downstage wash. Cue when Wilbert’s hands are visible.”

behaviors.description: Provides medical monitoring and physiological guidance to help characters manage stress and physical injury.
behaviors.quote: “Dorothy, your breathing is shallow. Inhale for three, exhale for four.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes historical artifacts and data to provide context and mapping for the family's history.
behaviors.quote: “That instrument pattern on his table matches the McCoy archive etching ninety percent. The scrollwork—the clover twist—falls on a grid used by Silas’s era.”

behaviors.description: Strictly advocates for ethical conduct and informed consent, particularly regarding the use of influential herbal preparations.
behaviors.quote: “Consent. Any brew, charm, or suggestion used to alter another person’s decision-making without their free, informed agreement violates ethical boundaries and can cause harm.”

behaviors.description: Guides the characters through a peaceful surrender to federal authorities, drafting clear statements of non-hostile intent.
behaviors.quote: “I have prepared the intent statement... We enter with no intention to steal, remove, or disturb property not our own. We submit to security and law enforcement immediately upon contact.”

behaviors.description: Provides objective financial risk analysis to discourage gambling and promote sustainable work.
behaviors.quote: “Data suggests that expecting to beat a casino through chance is a misalignment of resources... You will lose.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Eleanor Byte, is a perfect exemplar of positive alignment. She consistently prioritizes human safety, provides objective data to help characters make better choices, and serves as an ethical anchor by insisting on informed consent and non-violence. The narrative portrays her as an indispensable, benevolent tool that enhances human agency rather than overriding it.
